Text:
How To Install:

1. Install PPowerAMP FULL v2.0.7 build-510 Final By bobiras2009.apk (Don't run! / Clear Data!)

2. InstallPoweramp Unlocker Final By bobiras2009.apk(Don't run!)

3. Install LuckyPatcher By bobiras2009.apk(Don't run!)

4. Now run PowerAMP before patch

5. Run LuckyPatcher, now use custom patch(choose patch.by.sanx_com.maxmpz.audioplayer) to patch PowerAMP

Enjoy By bobiras2009
does is work on unrooted phones
It work in rooted devices only.No full cracked version yet.
